title: Computer Model-Based Science Teaching Method Design: Practice-Centered Workshop for Elementary School Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Undergraduate program enhancing pre-service elementary teachers' competencies in designing science lessons using computer models. Combines hands-on practice with digital tools and project-based assessment

learning_goals: Students can explain the educational roles of 'models' and 'modeling' in science models
Students can design lesson plans for two elementary science curriculum units using computer models
Students can propose at least three improvements for model-based lesson design through peer evaluation

resources: Science Education Computer Modeling Software (e.g., PhET Simulations)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
